course_title: Running a Successful Dog Walking Business
description: Learn how to manage and grow your dog walking business with Dog Dollars, a comprehensive platform for bookings, schedules, walkers, clients, payments, and report cards.

modules.title: Introduction to Dog Walking Business Management

lessons.title: Getting Started with Dog Dollars
lessons.description: Learn how to sign up for Dog Dollars, navigate the platform, and start managing your dog walking business

lessons.title: Setting Up Your Business Profile
lessons.description: Discover how to create a custom domain, add your business information, and configure your settings for success

lessons.title: Managing Client Information and Preferences
lessons.description: Understand how to store client data, track preferences, and use this information to improve your services

lessons.title: Creating and Managing Bookings
lessons.description: Learn how to schedule bookings, use recurring bookings, and manage your calendar for efficient time management

lessons.title: Adding and Managing Walkers
lessons.description: Find out how to add walkers to your team, assign them to bookings, and track their performance

lessons.title: Using the Mobile App for Walkers
lessons.description: Discover how walkers can use the mobile app to check-in, send photos, and leave notes for clients

lessons.title: Automating Invoicing and Payments
lessons.description: Learn how to generate automatic invoices, accept online payments, and track your revenue

lessons.title: Using Report Cards and Photos
lessons.description: Understand how to send beautiful report cards with photos and notes to keep clients engaged and informed

lessons.title: Tracking Revenue and Performance
lessons.description: Discover how to use business analytics to track your revenue, walker performance, and client retention

lessons.title: Scaling Your Business with Dog Dollars
lessons.description: Learn how to use Dog Dollars to grow your business, including tips for expanding your team and services
